CODE_DESCRIPTION: This p5.js sketch continuously draws dynamic Bezier curves using Perlin noise to generate smooth, randomized control points. Each curve has a unique color and position. The user can toggle pause/resume with mouse clicks, and the sketch includes an optional recursive function to draw multiple curves at decreasing scale.
GENERATION_METHOD: Perlin noise-driven control points with recursive and interactive Bezier curve generation
OUTPUT_DESCRIPTION: Animated visualization of continuously generated Bezier curves in varying colors on a black background, with smooth flowing lines and optional recursive detail.
